content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Apart from creation and group membership update SD PC is also responsible for additional manipulations with already created DGs: owner change, allow owner to update membership list, allow to receive emails from external addresses, allow sending emails on behalf of DG, create additional aliases (SMTP), etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please review the full list of actions performed by SD PC team: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHELP/Distribution+Groups+Creation+and+Management#DistributionGroupsCreationandManagement-ActionsperformedbySDProcessingCenter\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Distribution Groups Creation and Management\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Detailed process on how to perform each type of request is described in WI \\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHELP/Instructions?preview=%2F378543447%2F702580747%2FEPM-HELP_WI_Distribution+Group+Creation+and+Management.doc\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Distribution Group Creation and Management\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"‚Äù):\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Granting permissions to send e-mails on behalf of a DG. For details study p. 9 HOW TO PROVIDE PERMISSIONS FOR SENDING EMAILS ON BEHALF OF THE DISTRIBUTION GROUP\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Granting permission to update or approve update of a DG membership list.
